snippet: Ken Allen, chief executive of the shipping company DHL Express, was not coy when asked by the German newspaper Handelsblatt whether he was interested in making any big merger deals. "At the moment, I would rather swallow razor blades than take over...
abstract: Ken Allen, chief executive of the shipping company DHL Express, was not coy when asked by the German newspaper Handelsblatt whether he was interested in making any big merger deals. "At the moment, I would rather swallow razor blades than take over larger competitors," Mr. Allen said, according to Reuters.
